title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Health Updates: coconut oil vs Alzheimer’s; healthcare (greed drives innovation); 10billion$ Federal Disability Program... <!--more--> gives parents incentive to have children diagnosed with behavior disorder.

Commentaries: Poverty in America; the Hunger Game; America’s #1 export = jobs William Hartung is the Director of the Arms and Security Initiative at the New America Foundation, a nonprofit academic resource organization dedicated to informing the media, policymakers & citizens about issues of weapons proliferation, military spending & national security issues.
He has written extensively on nuclear threats and the private military industrial complex.
“Prophets of War: Lockheed Martin and the Making of the Military Industrial Complex”.
America’s military industrial complex and how it manipulates the shaping of American society.
